div.div: Week 5 updates for learning at home. Older updates may be found under District -> COVID-19 -> Learning at Home
div.a: Read More about Learning at Home Week 5

div.div: Please see our updated meal service flyer with our new safety protocols. We are happy to be able to offer our free meal service to any child.
Please see the attached document from Superintendent Baird for updates on the school closure
div.a: Read More about Letter to Families 4/9/2020

div.p: The Hebron Public Schools, in partnership with families and the community, is committed to fostering confidence, creativity, responsibility, and academic excellence in our children to enable them to explore the possibilities in their diverse world as respectful, contributing members of their community.
